attributes.action: make fragrance free soap a must for all public bathrooms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people today suffer with allergies to fragrances & I have yet to come accross fragrance free soap in a public bathroom.  I find this very un-hygeneic & often try to use self bought fragrance free dry soap but this prooves to be very expensive.  Surely suffering with an allergy is hard enough, why should I have to pay extra?
